feed.title: Libconsensus separated repository (was Bitcoin Core and hard forks)

entry.title: Libconsensus separated repository (was Bitcoin Core and hard forks)
entry.summary: On July 27, 2015, Eric Voskuil discussed the optional nature of performance sacrifices and an OpenSSL dependency within their stack for application developers. However, with the activation of BIP66, which only allows strict DER signatures, consensus has been reached for removing the OpenSSL dependency. Pieter Wuille was set to make an announcement regarding this change in the near future.
